ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk50:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk50:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk50:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six made a chomping sound while eating. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk50:1.3.1_0: “‘I will not make a chomping sound while eating,’ this is how you should train.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk50:1.4_0: One should not make a chomping sound while eating.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk50:1.5_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, makes a chomping sound while eating, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk50:1.7.1_0: or it has not been trusted ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk50:1.9_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on tenth rule, is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk50:1.10_0: The fifth sub-chapter on mouthfuls is finished.
